fullplot: Tamara is a girl who didn't quite fit in. Tamara is constantly picked on and when a couple of friends plays a joke on Tamara, it leads to her death. The friends bury her tries to make it seem that Tamara ran away. But all is not forgotten. Tamara reutrns as a sexy seductress and plans her revenge. (due to witchcraft). Well like they say: Karma's a bitch.
plot: Tamara, an unattractive girl, who is picked on by her peers returns after her death as a sexy seductress to exact revenge.
title: Tamara
